text: Kenneth Charles Williams (22 February 1926 â€“ 15 April 1988) was a British actor and comedian. He acted in movies including 26 Carry Ons. He appeared in many television and radio shows and on stage. ==Life and death== Wiiliams was gay.Kenneth Williams was glad to be gay He was born in North London and died there of a barbiturate overdose. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1926 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:British radio actors Category:Comedians from London Category:Drug- related deaths in the United Kingdom Category:English movie actors Category:English LGBT writers Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English television writers Category:English voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT comedians Category:Writers from London
